医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
医疗保险患者经常在支持治疗的情况下接受积极的治疗根据一项分析Medicare记录的研究，许多患有晚期癌症的医疗保险患者以牺牲支持性护理为代价接受了潜在的积极治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/20250222/medicare-patients-with-cancer-cancer-often-receive-aggressive-grestratment-warteatment-warteatment-vorevortive-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/medicare-patients-with-cancer-often-receive-receive-aggressive-warteatment-warteatment-warteatment-vorevortive-pportive-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be5ead76-dab6-42ef-9EB1-9EB1-396936149E10 Sat, 22 Feb 2025 14:18:17 -0500 Medicare patients with cancer often receive aggressive treatment over supportive care
社交媒体和同伴压力加油危险的药物滥用社交媒体趋势和同伴压力可能对您的孩子及其朋友来说是一种危险的组合，尤其是在滥用药物时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/social-media-and-pers-pressure-fueling-dangeric-drug-misuse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/social-media-and-pers-pressure-fueling-danger-danger-drug-misuse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5A35B650-7E65-4395-A4A8-D82C0B4EAE8EA Sat, 22 Feb 2025 14:08:54 -0500 Social media and peer pressure fueling dangerous drug misuse
推进显微镜以捕获3D中的蛋白质取向俗话说，两个人比一个人好，有时是两种乐器，巧妙地重新融合了，可以实现这一壮举。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/advancing-microscopy-to-capture-protein-entientation-in-eientation-in-3d.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/advancing-microscopy-to-capture-protein-entientation-in-erientation-in-3d.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=399e9a81-ec12-46d9-8b73-3a9603142f5f Sat, 22 Feb 2025 14:05:06 -0500 Advancing microscopy to capture protein orientation in 3D
新的计算工具idomo改善了药物协同作用的预测西奈山伊恩医学院的研究人员开发了一种强大的计算工具，名为Idomo，以改善药物协同作用的预测，并加速对复杂疾病的组合疗法的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/new-computational-tool-igomo-improves-prediction-of-drug-synergy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/new-computational-tool-igomo-improves-prediction-of-drug-synergy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=858e58e58C1-5070-4221-AB60-481F27A66486 Sat, 22 Feb 2025 10:52:04 -0500 New computational tool iDOMO improves prediction of drug synergy
CAR-T细胞治疗后淋巴瘤的发展某些形式的血液癌（例如多发性骨髓瘤和淋巴瘤）是来自免疫细胞（特别是淋巴细胞）的恶性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/development-of--lymphoma-following-car-t-cell-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/development-of--lymphoma-following-car-t-cell-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53048A62-5E91-4175-80D8-29DC7337DB02 Sat, 22 Feb 2025 10:04:02 -0500 Development of lymphoma following CAR-T cell therapy
新的遗传医学为盲人提供改变生活的视力改善在Meiragtx的支持下，通过UCL眼科研究所和Moorfields眼科医院，在开创性的新遗传医学治疗后，有四个年幼的儿童在视力方面改变了人们的视力改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/new-genetic-medicine-finders-life-changing-vision-vision-vision-mprovements-for for-blind-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/new-genetic-medicine offers-life-changing-vision-vision-vision-mprovements-for-blind-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baa6bb13-77b5-4437-9754-0a812fc386b5 Sat, 22 Feb 2025 09:55:16 -0500 New genetic medicine offers life-changing vision improvements for blind children
工作场所欺凌与员工及其伴侣的睡眠问题有关根据今天发表的新研究，工作场所欺凌不仅影响员工的睡眠，而且会影响他们的伴侣的睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/20250222/workplace-bullying-linked-to-sleep-problems-in-poployees-in-employees-and-their-partners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/20250222/workplace-bullying-linked-to-sleep-problems-in-employees-and-phemployees-and-their-partners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74abb82d-db55-4072-8f5b-69136a58cec3 Sat, 22 Feb 2025 09:39:16 -0500 Workplace bullying linked to sleep problems in employees and their partners
AI驱动的发现公开了TNIK抑制作用作为抗衰老策略由Insilico医学研究人员领导的一项开创性研究揭示了TNIK抑制作用作为创新的抗衰老策略的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/ai-driven-discovery-unveils-tnik-inik-inikition-anas-ans-anti-aging-strategy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/ai-driven-discovery-unveils-unveils-tnik-inik-inibition-aas-anti-aving-strategy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15A04B18-B85F-4F69-97E6-A57FE0AEDADADB Sat, 22 Feb 2025 08:54:33 -0500 AI-driven discovery unveils TNIK inhibition as anti-aging strategy
研究发现如何治疗慢性非癌症疼痛缺乏共识慢性疼痛很复杂且难以治疗。处方阿片类止痛药已引起争议，但可能会对某些患者有所帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/study-finds-lack-of-consensus-consensus-on-how-to-to-to-to-chreat-chronic-non-cancer-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/20250222/study-finds-lack-of-consensus-consensus-on-how-to-to-to-to-chreat-chronic-non-non-cancer-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7CD4206-0C06-4A87-BDB1-72B2CA2864DA Sat, 22 Feb 2025 08:31:29 -0500 Study finds lack of consensus on how to treat chronic non-cancer pain
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究发现，paxlovid对接种疫苗的老年人没有显着好处根据新的UCLA领导的研究，Paxlovid并不能显着降低接种疫苗的老年人的住院和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/ucla-study-finds-no-no-simenfificant-benefit-benefit-of-paxlovid-for-ver-ver-ver-ver-vaccined-vaccined-vaccined noder-apts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/UCLA-study-finds-no-significant-benefit-of-paxlovid-for-vaccinated-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41143166-3A34-45CF-A475-E9971586DC44 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 23:54:10 -0500 UCLA study finds no significant benefit of paxlovid for vaccinated older adults
